title: How to interview & hire the right people. V.2
other_title: How to interview and hire the right people. V.2
description: In this seminar presentation with Stephen Carline, we learn effective ways of getting candidates to move beyond rehearsed answers and provide the "whole" truth and how to clarify and quantify reaction to each candidate. We learn to conduct an interview where everyone is comfortable and open through an interviewing system that stops the guessing games.
